metadata.synopsis: The monk spirit inside the Sentient Amulet reacts to the environment of the Sharran Grotto beneath Baldur's Gate.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe MonkAmulet_Get" and equip the amulet.- Approach the underground entrance to the Sharran Grotto where Viconia can be found:S_LOW_MonkAmulet_SharranGrottoBanter_c00ca9c7-f1f4-4134-86b2-ebddcd3b6ae5

1.speaker: GROUP_GLO_MonkAmulet_Spirit
1.text: HmhmHEE! Pesky Sharrans, infesting every nook and cranny with their goddess' looming shadow.

0.speaker: GROUP_GLO_MonkAmulet_Spirit
0.text: Prithee take my words in the bitter spirit they are meant.
